criteria: Ability to Differentiate Between Valid and Invalid Sources
Application of Knowledge to Real-World Scenarios
descriptions: Student cannot identify any valid sources of information regarding alcohol, tobacco, and other drugs.
Student struggles to differentiate between valid and invalid sources and provides inaccurate information.
Student can identify some valid sources but needs prompting and guidance to distinguish them from invalid sources.
Student demonstrates a basic understanding of valid sources and can identify them with minimal assistance.
Student confidently identifies valid sources of information and can explain why they are reliable.
Student expertly identifies and evaluates a wide range of valid sources, explaining their reliability with depth and insight.
Student shows no understanding of what makes a source reliable or unreliable.
Student has a limited understanding of source reliability and struggles to articulate the characteristics of a reliable source.
Student can identify some characteristics of a reliable source but needs prompting to fully explain them.
Student demonstrates a general understanding of source reliability and can explain some key characteristics.
Student clearly articulates the characteristics of a reliable source and provides examples to support their explanation.
Student demonstrates a deep and nuanced understanding of source reliability, considering multiple factors and perspectives.
Student cannot apply their knowledge of valid sources to real-world scenarios involving alcohol, tobacco, and other drugs.
Student struggles to apply their knowledge and provides inaccurate or irrelevant information in real-world scenarios.
Student can apply their knowledge to some real-world scenarios but needs guidance to make connections.
Student demonstrates the ability to apply their knowledge to real-world scenarios with minimal assistance.
Student confidently applies their knowledge to real-world scenarios and provides accurate and relevant information.
Student expertly applies their knowledge to a variety of complex real-world scenarios, demonstrating critical thinking and problem-solving skills.
